mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, notice_num, notice_title, notice_date from (select * from notice order by notice_date desc, notice_num desc)) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 3
select * from notice order by notice_num desc

select * from (select rownum rnum, notice_num, notice_title, notice_date, notice_writer, notice_content, notice_original_filename, notice_rename_filename, notice_readcount from (select * from notice where notice_title like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' order by notice_readcount desc
)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum rnum, notice_num, notice_title, notice_date, notice_writer, notice_content, notice_original_filename, notice_rename_filename, notice_readcount from (select * from notice where notice_content like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' order by notice_readcount desc
)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select * from notice where notice_num = #{ notice_num }
mapper.delete: delete from notice where notice_num = #{ notice_num }
mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_num, notice_title, notice_writer, notice_date, notice_original_filename, notice_rename_filename, notice_content, notice_readcount) values (default, #{ notice_title }, #{ notice_writer }, sysdate, #{ notice_original_filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ notice_rename_filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ notice_content }, default )
mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where notice_title like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
select count(*) from notice where notice_content like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
